greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = C( C(n,2), k) for n >= 1, 0 <= k <= C(n,2).
comment: T(n,k) gives number of labeled simple graphs with n nodes and k edges.
reference: J. L. Gross and J. Yellen, eds., Handbook of Graph Theory, CRC Press, 2004; p. 517.
link: R. J. Mathar, Statistics on Small Graphs, arXiv:1709.09000 (2017) table 66.
xref: Cf. A083029. A subset of the rows of Pascal's triangle A007318.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jul 13 2003
